text: The Women's Javelin Throw event at the 2006 European Championships in Gothenburg, Sweden had a total number of 27 participating athletes. The final was held on Sunday August 13, 2006, and the qualifying round on Saturday August 12, 2006 with the mark set at 61.00 metres. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style=" text-align:center; font-size:110%;" width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Steffi Nerius Germany (GER) |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Barbora Špotáková Czech Republic (CZE) |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Mercedes Chilla Spain (ESP) |} ==Schedule== *All times are Eastern European Time (UTC+2) {| class="wikitable" style=" text-align:center; font-size:110%;" width="35%" |- !colspan="2"|Qualification Round |- !Group A !Group B |- |12.08.2006 - 10:30h |12.08.2006 - 12:00h |- !colspan="2"|Final Round |- |colspan="2"|13.08.2006 - 14:35h |} ==Abbreviations== {| class="wikitable" style=" text-align:center; font-size:110%;" width="35%" |- |bgcolor="ccffcc"| Q || automatic qualification |- |bgcolor="ddffdd"| q || qualification by rank |- |DNS || did not start |- |NM || no mark |- |WR || world record |- |AR || area record |- |NR || national record |- |PB || personal best |- |SB || season best |} ==Records== {| class="wikitable" style=" text-align:center;
